item.title: What the Hell Are Layer2 Rollups
item.description: I always felt management in distributed systems could be solved removing as much human as possible. Back in 2010, while I was working as a researcher in (dadad)[Poznan University of Technology], I was researching a concept proposed by IBM called autonomic computing.
